You haven’t told the robot what you want to do when running it. I recommend taking a read of the RobotPy docs.

RobotPy

Running robot code

Now that you’ve created your first Python robot program, you probably want to know how to run the code. The process to run a python script is slightly different for each operating system. How to ex...

@Miracle_GO What is your goal here? From your questions on Gitter and now here, it seems like you are trying to learn how to program a roborio using python/robotpy. I pointed you to FROG3160/2022-robotpy as an example of using robotpy with the MK4i swerve modules, specifically. That was last years code and there have been many updates to wpilib and robotpy that would require changes to make it run this year. I was expecting you to just look through it for ideas on how to get a swerve drive running, not to copy and try running it.

yeah,you are right~ i am trying to figure out how to program a roborio using python/robotpy~ and my goal here is how can i solve these two problems or let’s say if my understanding is right or not, cause it seems like those twos should work but it didn’t by the time i posted this post yesterday~

i forget to keep editing yesterday cause it seems like i kind of figuring out something and went to deploy the second one with the robot~ and for the first one, i wanted to confirmed is that we should import the NetworkTables from pynetworktables2js~

and sure, we should definitely go through the ideas not just copy pasting things in order to really learn it~ and that’s i am doing these days~

And thanks you so much, David and Brian, and anyone who provided any help/idea/suggestion~~~~ i really appreciate it a lot~ you can’t imagine how happy i am when seeing the robot really run~ (although it’s not running as it’s expected, and for this point, we are trying to fix it)

forgive me if i keep asking stupid questions, lol~ really rookies here~~~
